author: Justine Coleman
title: Activists and pastors sue Texas governor over stay-at-home order
description: Activists and pastors filed a lawsuit against Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) over his stay-at-home order Thursday, saying it violates their constitutional rights. Steve Hotze, a conservative activist...
content:
Activists and pastors filed a lawsuit against Texas Gov. Greg Abbott (R) over his stay-at-home order Thursday, saying it violates their constitutional rights. 
Steve Hotze, a conservative activist, and several Houston-area pastors accused the state's governo… [+1206 chars]
